description: Updates replication info of a replicator.

parameters.name: ConsumerGroupReplication
parameters.description: Updated consumer group replication information. List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups that should not be replicated. (string) --- List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups to copy. (string) --- Enables synchronization of consumer groups to target cluster. Enables synchronization of consumer group offsets to target cluster. The translated offsets will be written to topic __consumer_offsets.

nested_params.name: ConsumerGroupsToExclude
nested_params.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups that should not be replicated.

nested_params.name: ConsumerGroupsToReplicate
nested_params.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups to copy.

nested_params.name: DetectAndCopyNewConsumerGroups
nested_params.description: Enables synchronization of consumer groups to target cluster.

nested_params.name: SynchroniseConsumerGroupOffsets
nested_params.description: Enables synchronization of consumer group offsets to target cluster. The translated offsets will be written to topic __consumer_offsets.

parameters.name: ReplicatorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replicator to be updated.

parameters.name: SourceKafkaClusterArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the source Kafka cluster.

parameters.name: TargetKafkaClusterArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the target Kafka cluster.

parameters.name: TopicReplication
parameters.description: Updated topic replication information. Whether to periodically configure remote topic ACLs to match their corresponding upstream topics. Whether to periodically configure remote topics to match their corresponding upstream topics. Whether to periodically check for new topics and partitions. List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics that should not be replicated. (string) --- List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics to copy. (string) ---

nested_params.name: CopyAccessControlListsForTopics
nested_params.description: Whether to periodically configure remote topic ACLs to match their corresponding upstream topics.

nested_params.name: CopyTopicConfigurations
nested_params.description: Whether to periodically configure remote topics to match their corresponding upstream topics.

nested_params.name: DetectAndCopyNewTopics
nested_params.description: Whether to periodically check for new topics and partitions.

nested_params.name: TopicsToExclude
nested_params.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics that should not be replicated.

nested_params.name: TopicsToReplicate
nested_params.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics to copy.

nested_items.name: ReplicatorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replicator.
